page.title: 10Daily Life - A Schoolchild
page.content: During the afternoon we either carry on with our work or we play sports,such as rounders and football.We have a short playtime in the afternoon and sometimes we end the day by using the computer. At 3.30 we collect our belongings and go home. When I get home I put my things away and have my tea,which is something like chicken and vegetable pie and chips,and a drink of orange. After my tea I go out to play with my friends, and then at 7.30 I go home, have a bath, and eat some supper.I get ready for bed and then watch television until 9 o'clock when I go to bed.
